page.title: 01An overview of our area
page.content: Ours is an area of contrasts. {Brislington}for example has traces of an old settlement - even back to Roman times. It still possesses its ancient parish church and an old engine house from early mining days.{Knowle West} has grown up largely between the World Wars as inner city slum areas were cleared.{Whitchurch}however, is largely postwar and as Bristolians move ever outwards from the city, large housing estates seem to expand yearly. An area of farms and woodland, once with a pre-war air strip between the meadows is now being replaced by new estates, shopping complexes, super stores, sports areas and, above all, a network of main arterial roads linking these commuter areas with the great city of Bristol.
